Author: aspiringskinnybitch
Text: This is such good advice, thank you so much. Keeping this in my head every time I want to binge!

Author: paperklipp
Text: Compromise with yourself: do the exercise beforehand. Instead of “paying” for the binge afterwards, tell yourself you have to “earn” it first. Either you’ll decide it’s not worth it, or the exercise will make you feel good physically and you won’t want to binge anymore, or you’ll binge anyway but won’t feel as bad about it.
